divs: Sighting Detailsafter about 2:00am 1-8-2009 i saw a face fly off into the wall in the darkness as i was lyeing in bed. the face was human and i did not see a body. the face had black hair black eye browes and with fair skin truthly the face looked simalar to nick pope the ufo researcher without a body i saw the face 1 or 2 seconds in fact i bearly saw the face. between 3:30am and 3:45am 1-8-2008 i had a second encounter where this entity was grabbing me and i keep saying no about 2 or 3 times and i started to wake up and about 30 minites later i got out of bed. the ETS have at times would say something about jesus to get me to go with them. but this time i could not hear the ET say anything but i was saying no as if i was answering a question.
